<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 15"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Dragon Bile](/Equipment.aspx?ID=112)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Contact" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=37" />
<trait label="Poison" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=126" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 551 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 925 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 2 hands

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

A mix of digestive juices and [green dragon](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=167) poison glands nauseates the victim as its flesh is digested from within.

**Saving Throw** DC 37 Fortitude; **Onset** 1 minute; **Maximum Duration** 6 rounds; **Stage 1** 6d6 poison damage and [sickened 2](/Conditions.aspx?ID=34) (1 round); **Stage 2** 7d6 poison damage and sickened 3 (1 round); **Stage 3** 9d6 poison damage and sickened 4 (1 round)

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
